title: unknown error
body:
Every time i log on an unknown error pops up on my screen.Then when I scroll through my friends list it will pop up  3-7 times and when i come out of a game there has been as many as 15 unknown error notifications. It started after the 7.1 patch so i did the repair files thing 3 times to make sure that wasn't it but it only got worse after doing so.
 It doesn't affect my game in anyway but it is just getting really annoying having to keep clicking that button to remove the notifications.Oh and I am on the legacy client.

replies.body:
The *unknown error* usually crops up if your connection to our servers is *unstable*. This could be caused by a number of factors, but incompatible network settings are by far the most frequent we see. I suggest working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are configured properly.

Please let me know if this resolved the issue for you.

Ok.i saw where you told someone to use malbytes and i decided to try that. Ran the scan,found a trojan and removed it. Now ping is back to normal and the unknown error was gone on all but one person on my friends list.Removed them and it hasn't been popping up anymore.Come to think of it it may have started when I accepted that guy's friend invite.
